summary: Adds a Spell Tome in High Hrothgar that lets you push people.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a spell tome near the High Hothgar inside entrance (you might nee to use the tcl command to reach it) called The Oblivion Crisis. It teaches you the "Harmless Shove" spell, which lets you toss people around without them wanting to kill you. The spell lacks the "Hostile" flag, so it's like a fusrodah without the angry guards. The spell is nonlethal, unless you toss them off the Throat of the World (untested).
[youtube]U8GyH2RZQ7Q[/youtube]
author: CommunistTiger
